Entries.default:
"Knew... this job was rotten..."

He turns his face, with some difficulty, toward Maia.

"Wheel take you...Watcher..."

Clutching at his wounds, the man aims a bloodied grin up at you.

Beside you, Maia's brow wrinkles with confusion. Dawning realization flattens her expression. 

She moves to crouch beside the dying man.
With a final, shuddering gasp, the man lies still. Beneath the bloodied surface of his body, the essence of his spirit flutters free of him.
A muffled clatter draws your attention to the nearby chest.
The man is too far gone to react, if he has even heard you. He slips free of his life with little fanfare.
"Make this easy on yourselves. I'll make it quick."
"What the - Shit, behind us! Look sharp!"
The man is too far gone to react with more than the faintest gasp. He slips free of his life with little fanfare.
